properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
     '{Config.sourceSystem}'      AS SRC_SYS_CD
, AUFK.AUART AS MFG_ORDR_TYP_CD
, AFPO.AUFNR    AS MFG_ORDR_NUM
, AFPO.POSNR    AS LN_ITM_NBR
, trim(AFPO.AMEIN)                  AS PRDTN_UOM_CD
, trim(AFPO.CHARG)                  AS BTCH_NUM
, trim(AFPO.ELIKZ)                  AS DLV_CMPLT_IND
, trim(AFPO.MATNR)                  AS MATL_NUM
, trim(AFPO.MEINS)                  AS BASE_UOM_CD
, trim(AFPO.PLNUM)                  AS MFG_PLNND_ORDR_NUM
, cast(trim(AFPO.PSAMG) as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS SCRP_QTY
, cast(trim(AFPO.PSMNG) as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS ITM_QTY
, trim(AFPO.PWERK)                  AS PLNT_CD
, cast(trim(AFPO.UMREN)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS FCTR_DNMNTR_MEAS
, cast(trim(AFPO.UMREZ)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS FCTR_NMRTR_MEAS
, trim(AFPO.VERID)                  AS PRDNT_VRSN_NUM
, cast(trim(AFPO.WEBAZ) as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS GOOD_RCPT_LD_DAYS_QTY
, cast(trim(AFPO.WEMNG) as DECIMAL(18,4))  AS RCVD_QTY
, trim(AFPO.XLOEK)  AS DEL_IND
, case when AFPO.ltrmi = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.ltrmi,\"yyyyMMdd\") end  AS L1_LAST_PRODUCTION_DTTM
, trim(AFPO.lgort) AS  STRG_LOC
, trim(AFPO.psobs) AS SPL_PRCMT_TYPE
, trim(AFPO.qunum) AS NUM_OF_QTA_ARNG
, trim(AFPO.qupos) AS QTA_ARNG_ITM
, trim(AFPO.projn)AS  WRK_BRKDWN_STRC_ELMNT
, case when AFPO.strmp = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.strmp,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS  PLAN_ORDR_PLAN_STRT_DTTM
, case when AFPO.etrmp = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.etrmp,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS PLAN_ORDR_OPN_DTTM
, trim(AFPO.kdauf) AS  SLS_ORDR
, trim(AFPO.kdpos) AS SLS_ORDR_ITM
, trim(AFPO.kdein) AS  DELV_SCHED_FOR_SLS_ORDR
, trim(AFPO.beskz) AS  PRCMT_TYPE
, cast(trim(AFPO.iamng)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS EXPTD_SURPLUS
, cast(trim(AFPO.pamng)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS  PLAN_SCRAP_QTY
, cast(trim(AFPO.pgmng)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS  PLAN_TOT_ORDR_QTY
, trim(AFPO.knttp) AS  ACCT_ASGNMT_CAT
, trim(AFPO.tpauf) AS  PRTL_CONV_IN
, case when AFPO.ltrmp = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.ltrmp,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS PLAN_ORDR_DELV_DTTM
, trim(AFPO.kalnr) AS  COST_EST_NUM
, cast(trim(AFPO.uebto)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS  OVERDELV_TLRNC
, trim(AFPO.uebtk) AS  UNLMTED_OVERDELV_ALLW
, cast(trim(AFPO.untto)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS  UNDRDELV_TLRNC
, trim(AFPO.insmk) AS  STK_TYPE
, trim(AFPO.wepos) AS  GOODS_RCPT_IN
, trim(AFPO.bwtar) AS  VALUT_TYPE
, trim(AFPO.bwtty) AS  VALUT_CAT
, trim(AFPO.safnr) AS  RUN_SCHED_HDR_NUM
, trim(AFPO.sernr) AS  BOM_EXPLS_NUM
, trim(AFPO.techs) AS  PARM_VARIANT
, trim(AFPO.dwerk) AS  PLNT
, trim(AFPO.dauty) AS  ORDR_CAT
, trim(AFPO.dauat) AS  ORDR_TYPE
, case when AFPO.dgltp = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.dgltp,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS  BSC_FIN_DTTM
, case when AFPO.dglts = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.dglts,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS  SCHD_FIN_DTTM
, trim(AFPO.dfrei) AS ORDR_RELS_IN
, trim(AFPO.dnrel) AS ORDR_ITM_NOT_RLVNT_MRP_IN
, trim(AFPO.verto) AS MRP_DSTN_KEY
, trim(AFPO.sobkz) AS SPL_STK_IN
, trim(AFPO.kzvbr) AS CNSMPTN_PSTNG
, cast(trim(AFPO.wewrt)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS VAL_GOODS_RECV_IN_LCL_CRNCY
, trim(AFPO.weunb) AS GOODS_RCPT_NON_VALUTED
, trim(AFPO.ablad) AS UNLOADNG_PT
, trim(AFPO.wempf) AS GOODS_RCPNT
, trim(AFPO.gsber) AS BUSN_AREA
, trim(AFPO.weaed) AS GOODS_RCPT_IN_CN_BE_CHG_IN
, trim(AFPO.cuobj) AS CNFG
, trim(AFPO.kbnkz) AS KANBAN_IN
, trim(AFPO.arsnr) AS SETLM_RESV_NUM
, trim(AFPO.arsps) AS ITM_NUM_OF_THE_SETLM_RESV
, trim(AFPO.krsnr) AS NUM_OF_RESV
, trim(AFPO.krsps) AS ITM_NUM_OF_RESV
, trim(AFPO.kckey) AS COST_CLCT_KEY
, trim(AFPO.rtp01) AS COST_CLCT_FOR_REPTV_MFG
, trim(AFPO.rtp02) AS COST_CLCT_FOR_KANBAN
, trim(AFPO.rtp03) AS COST_CLCT_VAL_SLS_ORDR_STK
, trim(AFPO.rtp04) AS COST_CLCT_FOR_EXTRNL_PPC
, case when AFPO.ksvon = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.ksvon,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS  COST_CLCT_VLD_FROM_DTTM
, case when AFPO.ksbis = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.ksbis,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS  COST_CLCT_VLD_TO_DTTM
, trim(AFPO.objnp) AS OBJ_NUM
, trim(AFPO.ndisr) AS MATL_ORDR_ITM_IS_NOT_RLVNT
, cast(trim(AFPO.vfmng)  as DECIMAL(18,4)) AS CMT_QTY_FOR_ORDR_ACC
, case when AFPO.gsbtr = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(AFPO.gsbtr,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS  TOT_CMMT_DTTM
, trim(AFPO.kzavc) AS TYPE_OF_AVLBLTY_CHK_IN
, trim(AFPO.kzbws) AS VALUT_OF_SPL_STK
, trim(AFPO.sernp) AS SER_NUM_PRFL
, cast(trim(AFPO.anzsn)  as INT) AS NUM_OF_SER_NUMS
, trim(AFPO.objtype) AS CHG_IN
, trim(AFPO.ch_proc) AS PRCS_LEAD_TO_CHG_OF_AN_OBJ
, trim(AFPO.fxpru) AS FX_PRC_CO_PROD
, trim(AFPO.cuobj_root) AS CNFG_INTRNAL_OBJ_NUM
, trim(AFPO.berid) AS MRP_AREA
, trim(AFPO.techs_copy) AS PARM_VRNT
, NULL AS STK_SGMNT
, NULL AS CUST_NUM1
, NULL AS SEASN_YR
, NULL AS SEASN
, NULL AS FSHN_CLCT
, NULL AS FSHN_THEME
, NULL AS ALC_STK_QTY
, NULL AS NUM_OF_ORIG_ORDR
, NULL AS CNFRM_QTY_FOR_ITM
, NULL AS ITM_SEQ
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.AFPO AFPO
LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.AUFK AUFK
 ON (AUFK.AUFNR =  AFPO.AUFNR
    AND AUFK._deleted_='F' and AUFK.mandt = '600' )
where AFPO._deleted_='F' and AFPO.mandt = '600'  
 
""")
